thread.title: Amir Hekmati offers thanks on one-year anniversary of prison release
thread.title_full: Amir Hekmati offers thanks on one-year anniversary of prison release

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Amir Hekmati offers thanks on one-year anniversary of prison release
text: "So I want everyone to know how grateful I am, and that my family and I wouldn't have been able to get through these difficult times without all of your support," he said. "Finally, for any of you who are struggling with difficulty, there is always hope, and please never give up."
